Domestic equities  end mixed 
2019-11-13
Chinese shares posted mixed results yesterday.
The Shanghai Composite Index had increased by 0.17 percent to 2,914.82 points, while the Shenzhen Component Index shed 0.11 percent to 9,670.14 points. The blue chip CSI300 index fluctuated to 3,903.69 points.
Turnover on the two major bourses totaled 365.5 billion yuan (US$52.14 billion), down from 422.99 billion yuan on Monday.
Shipbuilders, coal and chemical stocks led the day’s gains but precious metals’ shares suffered the biggest losses.
